Description: An ebony arrowhead: of circular section, with a tapering tang at the base, broken off at the end.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
Curator's comments: For similar objects, see W. M. F. Petrie, 'Royal Tombs of the Earliest Dynasties' II, pls.VIIA, 7; XXXVII, 14; XL, 11; XLIII, 9; W. M. F. Petrie, 'Tarkhan I and Memphis V' (London, 1913), pl.X, 7; A. Scharff, ‘Die Altertümer der Vor – und Frühzeit Ägyptens’ I (Berlin, 1929-31), no. 198 and pl.9. Bibliography: W. M. F. Petrie, 'Royal Tombs of the Earliest Dynasties' II, pl.XXXIV, 50-1 (exmaples).
